## Description
A clear description of the tech debt item.

## Impact
What problems does this cause? (e.g., maintenance burden, performance, security risk)

## Proposed Fix
Outline the recommended approach to resolve this.

## Location
Which files or components are affected?

## Estimated Effort
How long would this take to fix? (e.g., 30 minutes, 2-3 hours, 1 day)
